name: God Dragon
description:
Play a simple card game against a bot!

Brown Cards: Defense

                   Shield: Defend against dragon, snake and punch attacks

                   Absorb: Absorb magic attacks

Purple Cards: Attack

                   Dragon, snake and magic attacks have 1-3 attack power. Punch and lightning have 1 attack power.

Blue Cards: Charge attacks

                   Dragon ball charges dragon, flute charges snake, wand charges magic attacks.
